label: TransportMovement
comment: The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: A date, time, date time or other date time value when this logistics transport movement crosses a border.
A code specifying a call purpose for this logistics transport movement.
The textual description of the cargo for this logistics transport movement.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value by which cargo should be loaded onto the means of transport for the departure of this logistics transport movement.
The cycle, as expressed as text, of this logistics transport movement, such as twice a day.
The indication of whether or not dangerous goods are carried for this logistics transport movement.
A proprietary identifier.
Information, expressed as text, concerning the transport of these dangerous goods.
The code specifying a status for the logistics transport movement, such as estimated or final.
The indication of whether or not the manifest for this logistics transport movement is onboard.
The mode, expressed as text, of this logistics transport movement.
The name of the item.
The identifier of a pilotage exemption for this logistics transport movement.
A code specifying a reason for the declared error.
Reported security information, expressed as text, for this logistics transport movement.
Sailing advice notification information, expressed as text, for this logistics transport movement.
A unique identifier for this logistics transport movement, such as a voyage number, flight number, or trip number, as stated in a schedule.
The service, expressed as text, of this logistics transport movement.
The code specifying the service of this logistics transport movement, such as regular, milk run or spot service.
A stage, expressed as text, of this logistics transport movement.
The unique identifier of a stay in a port, airport or other place of service for this logistics transport movement.
A unique identifier for this logistics transport movement as assigned by a terminal operator.
The unique identifier for this logistics transport movement as assigned by the trading consolidator.
The code specifying the transit direction of this logistics transport movement.
The code specifying the mode, such as by air, sea, rail, road or inland waterway, for this logistics transport movement.
The code specifying the stage of this logistics transport movement.
The type, as expressed as text, of the logistics transport movement.

objectProperties.comment: A set of formal steps to satisfy a cross-border regulation, law or convention.
A charge made for a logistics related service.
The process of performing documented checks, such as on materials or processes, with a focus on discovering deviations, errors or faults related to documented requirements.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.
An arrival event for this logistics transport movement.
The convoy associated with this logistics transport movement.
A border crossing event for this logistics transport movement.
A call event for this logistics transport movement.
A distinctive feature of a material contained within physical goods.
Details of transport means inactively carried during the transport movement, such as trucks on a Roll-On/Roll-Off (RORO) ferry.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
A person who is a member of the crew of the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
Specified privately owned articles for personal use by an individual.
A damage event for this logistics transport movement.
A departure event during this logistics transport movement.
An excess transport service for this logistics transport movement.
The first arrival event for this logistics transport movement.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A route in the itinerary of this logistics transport movement.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The loading event during which goods will be or have been loaded into or onto the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
Transport information of an instructive nature.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The person legally responsible for the operation of the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
A stores inventory item held onboard for this logistics transport movement.
A person onboard this logistics transport movement.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health) transportation health information reported for this logistics transport movement.
Transportation waste material reported for this logistics transport movement.
A ship to ship event for this logistics transport movement.
Transport information of an instructive nature.
A calculated emission specified for this logistics transport means.
Handling information of an instructive nature.
A status specified for this logistics transport movement.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.
The result of a logistics risk analysis calculation.
A transport event specified for this logistics transport movement.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The officer responsible for the security of the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.
A transshipment intermediate event during this logistics transport movement.
The unloading event during which goods will be or have been unloaded from the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
Transport information of an instructive nature.
The means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.

referencedBy.comment: The logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment at the point when the means of transport arrives in a country or at a regional border.
The logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment at the point when the means of transport departs a country or regional border.
A border crossing logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment.
A main carriage logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment.
An on-carriage logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment.
A pre-carriage logistics transport movement for this referenced supply chain consignment.
A logistics transport movement specified for this supply chain consignment.
